descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]Dagger of Time[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][COLOR=#0070c0][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=5] by Standalone09[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Feature:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[youtube]cVft6uxFCjg[/youtube]              [youtube]h3GTrfKgrAo[/youtube]

[youtube]MFKoaRRtFCY[/youtube]

videos by Gruntlock, dptheslothking and achievementtrap thank you guys!!! :)           

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Description:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

First of all pls guys i need your opinion! So Comment!

Then the Dagger has now an custom Enchantment\\Spell (YAY) wich slows time for the first 8 seconds it gets drawn so choose when you start your fight, have fun! :) 

Shout out to my friend KettleWitch he is in charge for the Awesome Enchantment and he teached me how to make the very complex textures for this so thank you man you rock. :)
And please check his stuff out too :) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6140922/?tb=mods&pUp=1

Here i present to you a custom slightly modified version of the \\\\\\\"Dagger of Time\\\\\\\" from the Game Series Prince of persia.
At the moment you can only ( [SIZE=1]i will learn how to do quests.... [/SIZE] ) craft it yoursef under the daedric category with the following materials needed:

2 Gold Ingots
3 Dragon bones
1 Ebony Ingot

Stats:

Damage: 13.00
Speed:   1.400
Reach:   0.700
Weight:  8.000

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Install:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your Skyrim\\\\\\\\Data folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the sends.esp 

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Uninstall:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]


Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
